definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: The Thames flows rather slowly, which is very favourable for water transportation.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河流動得相當慢，十分有利於水路運輸。

sentences.english: We houseboated along the Thames yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我們昨天乘居住船遊覽了泰晤士河的沿岸風光。
我們乘船順泰晤士河而下。

sentences.english: The right bank of the Thames River is on the south side because the river flows east.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河右岸位於那邊，因爲這條河是往東流的。

sentences.english: The Thames rises in the Cotswold Hills.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河發源於科茨沃爾德丘陵。

sentences.english: Westminster Abby, neo-Gothic design stands in front of Thames River.
sentences.chinese: 威斯敏斯特艾比，新哥特式設計看臺前面的泰晤士河。

sentences.english: Windsor Great Park and the River Thames at Runnymede are both within walking distance.
sentences.chinese: 溫莎公園及羅內米德段的泰晤士河就在學院附近。
泰晤士河在默默消蝕着遊船。

sentences.english: H.M.S. Beagle was launched from the Woolwich Dockyards on the River Thames.
sentences.chinese: 英國艦隊貝格爾號從伍爾維奇船塢下水，入泰晤士河。

sentences.english: The Thames flows due south from Oxford, through the market town of Abingdon.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河從牛津向正南方向流去，穿過阿賓頓的集鎮。

sentences.english: I'm touching you the river Thames, as if touching scales of an ancient fish.
sentences.chinese: 我觸摸你泰晤士河，宛如觸摸一條古老的魚之鱗甲。

sentences.english: The upper Thames River in south-central England in the vicinity of Oxford. The name is used locally and in literature.
sentences.chinese: 伊希斯英格蘭中南部的泰晤士河上流，在牛津附近。

sentences.english: The London Eye on the river Thames across from the Houses of Parliament. (Jason Hawkes)
sentences.chinese: 英國國會大廈對面泰晤士河上的倫敦眼。

sentences.english: We walked along the Thames embankment.
sentences.chinese: 我們沿着泰晤士河的堤岸散步。

sentences.english: But the Thames Tunnel is ahistorical milestone in tunnel engineering .
sentences.chinese: 但是，泰晤士河隧道是隧道工程歷史上的一座里程碑。

sentences.english: Yes, you can visit The River Thames , the House of Parliament and the Big Ben.
sentences.chinese: 是的，可以參觀泰晤士河，國會大廈和英國大笨鐘。

definition: Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
Lake Ontario, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]

pinyin: Bu4 lu3 ke4 lin2 Da4 qiao2

definition: Lake Michigan, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]

pinyin: Te4 la1 fa3 jia1 Guang3 chang3

definition: Tiber (river in Italy, the main watercourse of Rome)

pinyin: Te4 la1 fa3 er3 jia1 guang3 chang3
